events.title: Joan of Arc attends the coronation of Charles VII

movie.title: Saint Joan
movie.plot: Young Joan of Arc comes to the palace in France to make The Dauphin King of France and is appointed to head the French Army. After winning many battles she is not needed any longer and soon she is thought of as a witch.

events.title: Wild Bill Hickok shoots two soldiers

movie.title: Wild Bill
movie.plot: Biopic about famous gunslinger Wild Bill Hickock. The early career of legendary lawman is telescoped and culminates in his relocation in Deadwood and a reunion with Calamity Jane.

events.title: Tsar Nicholas II and his family are killed by Bolsheviks

movie.title: Nicholas and Alexandra
movie.plot: Tsar Nicholas II, the inept last monarch of Russia, insensitive to the needs of his people, is overthrown and exiled to Siberia with his family.

events.title: Tsar Nicholas II and his family are killed by Bolsheviks

movie.title: Rasputin
movie.plot: Into an era seething with war and revolution, a man comes with an incredible power to heal a nation...or destroy it. Based on the true story of one of the most powerful and mysterious figures in Russian history.
movie.awards: Won 3 Golden Globes. Another 5 wins & 11 nominations.

events.title: Richard Speck is recognised in hospital and arrested

movie.title: Chicago Massacre: Richard Speck
movie.plot: A thriller film based on a real-life mass murder that took place in 1966. Richard Franklin Speck was a mass murderer who systematically tortured, raped and murdered eight student nurses from South Chicago Community Hospital in 1966.
